Extension Description for WebForAll:

WebForAll: Empowering Accessibility for Everyone

What is WebForAll?

WebForAll is a powerful and user-friendly web extension designed to enhance website accessibility for individuals with disabilities. By integrating key accessibility features directly into your browsing experience, WebForAll ensures that web content is more inclusive and navigable for everyone.

Current Key Features:

- Customizable Text Magnification: Easily enlarge text content on any webpage without affecting the layout. Perfect for users with visual impairments who need larger text to read comfortably.

- High-Contrast Mode: Toggle high contrast mode to invert colors and enhance text visibility. This feature improves clarity for users with low vision, making it easier to distinguish text from the background.

- Alt Text Tooltips: Automatically display alt text for images, providing context and descriptions that are essential for understanding visual content. Ideal for users who rely on screen readers or have difficulty seeing images.

- Text-to-Speech (TTS): Select any text on a webpage and have it read aloud. This feature is invaluable for users with visual impairments, reading difficulties, or those who prefer auditory learning.

Why Install WebForAll?

- Inclusive Browsing Experience: Ensure that all web users, regardless of their abilities, can access and enjoy online content effortlessly.

- Ease of Use: WebForAll is designed with simplicity in mind. With no complex setup required, you can enhance your browsing experience with just a few clicks.

- Enhanced Productivity: By removing barriers to web content, WebForAll helps users save time and reduce frustration, leading to a more productive online experience.

- Support for Businesses: Companies can demonstrate their commitment to inclusivity and social responsibility by making their websites accessible to a broader audience.

Join the Accessibility Movement:

WebForAll is an open-source project, welcoming contributions from developers worldwide. By installing WebForAll, you’re not only improving your own browsing experience but also supporting the ongoing effort to create a more inclusive web for everyone.

Install WebForAll and experience the web the way it should be – accessible for all.
